Articles.Content: A while ago, I had decided to switch my KSP account from the website over to steam, however, I clicked on the link to switch, but there happened to be an error, and the link to switch it over is now gone. Help? ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

I've moved this to support for now, it might end up in the Kerbal Network. The best course of action for errors like this is to contact [\[email protected\]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#a98c9eebc6d9ddc0c6c78c9eed) with the email address you used register with the store.
